Interrupts.Name: Trick of the Light
Interrupts.Trigger: An ally is targeted by an attack or ability from a foe.
Interrupts.Effects: That ally gains evasion against that attack or ability. After it resolves, teleport that ally 2 spaces to their 'real' location.

Actions.Name: Legerdemain
Actions.Description: The Broker places a fake valuables token down in range 3. It can't be picked up and only one can be placed at time, but characters standing in its space count as holding a token, which can't be dropped.
